product_name: Peter Rabbit Organics Veggie Squeeze Pouch
long_description: Peter Rabbit Organics Veggie Squeeze pouches are loaded with 100% organic fruits and vegetables, making it easy for you to get your daily dose of goodness. Pouches are packed full of 100% fruit and vegetables that have a thick, smooth texture; not diluted with water or juice and have no added sugar or preservatives. USDA organic ingredients are packaged in BPA-free squeezable pouches; fruits and vegetables can be enjoyed straight from the pouch. Unopened Peter Rabbit Organics Squeeze pouches do not require refrigeration; pouches fit easily in lunch boxes, handbags and backpacks. Cap design is suitable for use by young children; recommended for ages 6 mos. and older. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Peter Rabbit Organics Veggie Squeeze pouches are loaded with 100% organic fruits and vegetables, making it easy for you to get your daily dose of goodness.
